title: 'Soft material - Looks good with top.'
body: 'Soft material - Looks pretty especially with tops Adequate length. Nice and comfortable. Stretchable while sitting. Good purchase recommended for people. But you can’t drape a net saree on this. A good shape is assured when saree is worn with this.'
